title: The Teacher
occurrences: I am Maria Drazdechova, your new class teacher.
Excuse me, I want to ask why is comrade teacher not here?
Look, my position is difficult. I am the head teacher,
The teacher wants something from you. She needs something done.
-Did you hear what the teacher wants? -Yes.
Okay, I'll establish communication with comrade teacher.
I'm sorry, comrade teacher, but I have to disappoint you.
It won't, comrade teacher. Be sure of that.
Maria Drazdechova, Danka's class teacher. Good evening, Mrs Kucerova.
I'm sorry, head teacher, but I'm not listening to this.
Comrade teacher recently lost her husband. It's difficult for her.
But you can't blame the teacher when a child breaks down from stress.
Exactly. I'm shocked, head teacher, that you got involved in this.
How would you feel if a teacher said something like that to you?
Could someone tell me what the teacher said to her exactly?
-I'll see the head teacher. -Do you think she'll do anything?
They're all afraid of her. Including the head teacher.
by your lack of loyalty towards the teacher?
it was that bloody teacher's fault.
Liar! We'll take this to the head teacher.
The head teacher's office. Now!
Look in my eyes. What's going on? Teacher is pissed off, keeps complaining.
The teacher called about that washing machine.
Do you ever listen? His teacher needs her washing machine fixed.
Danka, you and Filip visit the teacher at home? What do you do there?
-I'm talking to my son's teacher. -You entered my flat
One more teacher's note you've made up about my son, and you have a problem.
-How do you want to do it? -Maybe I'll go to the head teacher...
of comrade teacher's competence.
Perfect. If the caretaker finds us, it's off to the head teacher's office.
You have your own problems and the teacher has been protecting you.
had to help comrade teacher do her shopping.
I asked comrade teacher not to send Alenka on errands around the city.
Can a teacher screw a parent'? Isn't that illegal?
I'll talk to the head teacher. She owes me.
That the head teacher would allow this.
You shouldn't say that. About anyone. Not even about your teacher.
I am Maria Drazdechova, your new class teacher.
